mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, phone, email, join_date,lev) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name},#{phone},#{email}, sysdate, 'guest')
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw = #{pw}, address_pn = #{address_pn}, address_ba=#{address_ba}, address_da = #{address_da}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, ad_birth=#{ad_birth}, ad_local =#{ad_local}, email_chk = #{email_chk} where id=#{id}
update member set mem_rank = #{mem_rank} where id=#{id}
